=== About Jason ===
<nowiki>[[File:jason.JPG]]</nowiki>
Jason Whitehorn is a Ubuntu/Linux contributer who's contributions to the Linux community vary from Ubuntu Wiki Documentation to composing technical support bots for IRC.

Jason is a Network and Services Administrator for Dell Computer's IRC Network.  His bots help assist technical support agents at Dell's "Alternate Operating Systems Support Queue".

==== Jason On IRC ====
Jason can be found chatting in public IRC in irc.freenode.net in #ubuntu and a few other assorted Ubuntu related channels under the nick "NMR_Techie".  If you are ever out chatting in Freenode, please free to message.

==== Jason's Current Linux Flavor ====
Jason currently uses Ubuntu 8.04 Gnome 2.22.2
